discription: When Deaconess Juliet Eneh spoke at the Joint Learning Initiative on Faith and Local Communities’ (JLI) recent series on child participation, her message was clear: when children have a voice, violence against children goes down.   It was this reasoning that led her to help establish Christ Care. This mentoring program educates Nigerian children about protecting themselves from abuse and reporting cases of abuse to the authorities
